name: Escape From Sector-37
description:
Escape From Sector-37

Escape From Sector-37 is a game made for Ludum Dare 46 (Theme: "Keep It Alive").

Instructions:

Escape From Sector-37 is a platformer with a twist. Instead of you reaching the end, [IT] must reach the end.

Controls:

A/D: Move Left / Right

SPACE: Jump

R: Restart Level

N: Skip Level
